website_summaries.verdict: Upgrade your cutlery with a modernly designed and highly functional set.
pros: Arrives packaged well and with a handsome block that adds style to your kitchen counter
The total knife count is just right, with each serving a purpose yet not so rigid that each can't perform a simple chop
Ideal for those who live by the ocean as these knives do not rust
cons: If chipping occurs, contact what is described as a stellar customer service team immediately for help

customer_reviews.title: Great set of sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my dad swears by the quality of the knives. I tried the smaller sandoku knive for slicing plumb tomatoes just yesterday. The knife cut sliced and diced all twenty tomatoes without a hiccup. I can’t wait to try the others. The only thing I would change about this set is adding a vegetable peeler. The design of the block is my favorite feature. Contemporary and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L Reid

customer_reviews.title: Why did I pick these?
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company sent me a completely new set without requesting it. Great service, they pay attention to their customers. One of the knives chipped within a couple of days. The stand is stylish. Knives come with protector so you can take your knife "to go" if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elona

customer_reviews.title: Look great, work great!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing! They are sharper than any of my other (much more expensive!) knives and I use them almost exclusively. I also LOVE the “block” that you store the knives in - it looks so great in my kitchen. Lastly, the company has amazing customer service. When my set arrived I noticed one small issue and the company immediately resolved it! Overall I am super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Oakland mwc

customer_reviews.title: Love my new knife set!!
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is AMAZING! I was looking for a high quality, modern looking knife set and this one exceeded my expectations. The knife block is really heavy (think durable and high quality) and can fit more knives if you have extras - it's space efficient and looks really great on my kitchen counter. The actual knives are crazy sharp and look really unique due to the white blades - you don't see that every day! I'll be purchasing this again for the next housewarming gift I need!
customer_reviews.author: I.C.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Two Knives!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set came with 2 identical knives (two 5'' and two 4''), there is no 7'' and 6'' knife. Are they kidding me? Now I’m thinking if they were used?? Knife itself is very neat and sharp but still can’t give out more than 1 star when I can’t even experience two other knives.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieCorgi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Knives!!!
customer_reviews.text: These knive sets are absolutely fantastic! I was able to put the steak knives around the outside of the knife set. I couldn’ believe the lknife holder. That soft sponge? Knife holder was a freest idea! A lot better than the regular type and doesn’t take up as much room on the counter! I threw out one of my old knife sets already. Please do not send me the wine aerator. We don’t drink that much wine if any. Thanks for the gift offer. Wish your company much success...but I think you won’t need it because you have a great product. Felicia
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: These Knives are SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: They are also easy to use, clean with one wipe of a dish cloth, and look great in the kitchen. I love the knife holder, and have never seen one of this style. I bought a set for my son-in-law, and liked them so much that I bought a set for myself and another for my brother-in-law. I was able to get rid of an entire bulky knife block and replace it with this set only. It has everything I need for kitchen use, and the price is perfect for a gift. I highly recommend this set -- just be careful! These knives will slice through everything like butter -- including your finger!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp but very fragile
customer_reviews.text: First time using one of the knives on a plastic cutting board, the tip of the knife broke. It's not like I was jabbing something hard with the end or using the knife in a manner it wasn't designed for. I was just slicing a chicken breast. It doesn't the make the knife unusable, it just makes it broken at the tip. I have a few ceramic knife sets from other manufacturers and none of them have ever broken. Just disappointed in the quality of the set.
customer_reviews.author: james m

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for our vacation home, mainly because the price was so reasonable! They are fantastic! The knives cut beautifully and the black knife holder is so attractive! It fits into any decor and works beautifully - there’s even room to add a few of your other knives. It was such a hit that my sister and nieces went right home and ordered it for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: DC3

customer_reviews.title: Great knives. Good price pt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my in-laws because their knives were beat up. The packaging is really nice so it does make a great gift and the inlaws love how they feel and cut. I was over there not too long ago and used the knives as well and couldn't agreee more. Very sharp and comfortable to hold, a real bargain given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy the Pup

customer_reviews.title: Last Kitchen Knives you will ever buy, they ROCK!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a knife collector for over 40 years I know and understand the art of the knife. This set of kitchen knives are fantastic. Sharp beyond compare and hold an edge seemingly forever. Comfortable in the hand, well made, easy to clean and sharp, sharp, sharp!! A wonderful gift for the chef in your life and 10% the cost of a hand forged steel set. If you don't like them you need to see a doctor!!
customer_reviews.author: John Davidoff

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Within a week, couple of knives chipped out... I would not recommended it
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives for my wife for Christmas, she loves them. They are very sharp and really nice quality. The knife holder is really cool too. Very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of ceramic knives!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very complete good set of ceramic knives for many uses and the price is good. The innovative holder is so convenient to use and looks good on the counter. One thing I was very impressed with was the packaging. It was so strong and sturdy that nothing could happen in transport. I felt that a great deal of thought went into the packaging for a product the company is proud of. The knife sharpener has been put to good use on my steel knives.
customer_reviews.author: uffda

customer_reviews.title: Great knifes with a stylish knife block!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of ceramic knifes with exactly this knife block. I’ve already decided to buy it separately, and finally found this product. It looks very stylish and it’s very easy to use. I was wondering if it’s possible to use it for other knifes, so, I’ve tried to find out the size of the knife block. But I failed, so now I share this information with everyone: block’s height is 9” and width is a bit smaller than 5”. And don’t forget about green cutting board (I forgot, but it’s there too).
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriia

customer_reviews.title: VOOV ceramic knives are worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: My VOOV Ceramic Knife set is wonderful. I cannot recommend it more highly. There is a wonderfully sharp knife for everything, and, they look very handsome. The knife sliced through a tomato so effortlessly that it was amazing. Congratulations to VOOV. Be sure to concentrate of what you are doing when handling the knives, or you may cut yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: First off knives are sharpest I’ve ever owned Be very careful as I slightly cut my thumb and didn’t even feel it . They come with protective sleeves and are very easy to clean and cut amazing Just think they maybe sharper then steel or metal knives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good product and we'll worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these knives for my son in law's birthday who is a very picky person to buy for. He really liked the knives and was so pleased to receive them which by the way arrived a day early so that pleased me along with a great price. Definitely worth it and I'm actually gonna order myself a set.
customer_reviews.author: C.E. L.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift. Well received. Knives slice and dice easily. Cleanup is a piece of cake. The crock and cutting board are a nice touch to the kitchen and keep knives in easy and safe reach. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Gift to Sister
customer_reviews.text: Hope she likes them... Nice looking set.... Gave this set to one of my Sisters... She is very happy with them... Actually Beaming with joy about them... So I guess You guys made points... Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not built for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set last year in July and was initially very happy with the convenient storage container, sheaths and cutting board. At this point one of the knives has several chips on the cutting edge and I'm almost afraid to use it for fear that ceramic chips will end up in my food.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy G

customer_reviews.title: Small chips in blade after prolonged use
customer_reviews.text: The knives are sharp but light. I wish the handles had more weight to them. Update - After a year of use I noticed small chips missing from the blade. Where did they go? I don’t recommend any ceramic knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom as a gift. They are no where as sharp as I thought they would be. I ended having to buy hera second set of steel knives to go along with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Has a serrated knife
customer_reviews.text: These knives are really sharp. I first tested them on a jicama; they passed the test. They cut nice and straight. I chose these because it was the only ceramic set I saw with a serrated knife. The ergonomic handles are a little too big for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it because knives are so sharp 👍 you can even put your other knives inside the stand... it’s is in such a fancy box that you can give it as a nice gift! Last of all, the company have satisfaction guarantee and 1 year warranty! They really care about customer satisfaction 👍
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a while on Amazon for a good ceramic knife set and settled on this set. Definately a great choice. Full ceramic, not just coated. Wife also loves the set
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Knife broke with first use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this ceramic knife set as the knife snapped off at the hilt with first pass on celery. Stick with good steal knives.
customer_reviews.author: valerie stevens-weiskopf

customer_reviews.title: Prep Cooking and Organization made easy!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are a dream... tomatoes, potatoes, bread, etc are made easy.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great knives with just the right sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love ceramic knives and this set has the right size knives for everyday cooking. Also includes a cool storage container.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Knife
customer_reviews.text: Besides the tip on paring knife broke off the rest are ok
customer_reviews.author: Michael Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I have found this product long time ago!!!! It’s unbelievable, how good it is!!!! I bought my first ceramic knife about 2-3 years ago and I pay for one $50 or soo... This set is ten times better and very affordable!!! I will totally recommend to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Constantin Soare

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay sharp long
customer_reviews.text: The knives arrived great. Initially very sharp. I would only hand wash and took great care. However after just two months of use, they became very dull! No longer work as expected. For that price I would expect them to stay sharp for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Use according to directions.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as expected. Ceramic knives came very sharp, and will likely stay that way for years. As with any ceramic blade, however, they are very brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They WILL break.
customer_reviews.text: Had these knives for a year. These super quality and super hard knives will break. Just broke the paring knife on a pear!
customer_reviews.author: Topgun

customer_reviews.title: Love sharp knives? These knives do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: The “box” to store the knives in appears to be a very large quantity of plastic. And it smells of plastic, too. I can’t use it in my house due to my husbands allergies (asthma)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife set.
customer_reviews.text: The knifes are nice and sharp. I hope they last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Siempre fiel sin fin

customer_reviews.title: They are sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice knives, my wife loves them as well and asked to buy a set for her mother. Nice holder for the knifes include stands up straight takes up very little room. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Bickford

customer_reviews.title: Quality items
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife a set of ceramic knives, and she loved them. I bought these after she said she wanted more. These knives were better than the first set. They fit the hand and of course they are sharp! They whole set looks good sitting on the counter, very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hansen

customer_reviews.title: buy  Ceramic knives well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic knives are very sharp Easy to clean Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Impressive knifes extremely sharp
customer_reviews.text: Impressive knives. Ultra sharp. Bought this second set as a gift. Easy too cut yourself if not careful and the corner edge near the handle can cut you if your hand is too far up the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My future son-in-law loved the gift
customer_reviews.text: They looked professional (and he is). --Susanna Maklakov, MSOT, Retired Professor of Occupational Therapy and Health Careers, Suffolk County Community College, Brentwood, New York (Long Island)
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Maklakov

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous set of ceramic knives!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous set of ceramic knives and so attractive! Bot another set for my summer home!
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod Queen

customer_reviews.title: Knives are great, holder is meh
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is the cylindrical holder. . . I would rather have a definitive place for each knife instead of the "straws." Otherwise, LOVE the knives!
customer_reviews.author: Marti Romero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great price. I love the Voov knife holder. Very satisfied with these knives!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Knives are easily accessible from knife holder and safe on counter top
customer_reviews.text: Ease of cutting and chopping. Care in using the knives is necessary since they are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth nehiley

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of knives for the price. Very sharp too!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Manning

customer_reviews.title: a great set of knives!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these knives so much that i ordered a second set to replace my mother's old set of knives. They are durable and sharp and with proper care, have lasted me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used much but packaged and looks great. All knifes are sharp. Will upgrade rating or downgrade after some use but look like quality knifes.
customer_reviews.author: gtg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The knives are super sharp- and a great range of blade types. Really liked the novel knife holder- It even had room to add my old ceramic friend. Sometimes, new IS better!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Heilemann

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try from stainless.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, balanced, sharp!, wash easily. Great knives at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: longview

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My family actually fought over these during our Secret Santa. 7 months in and they're still sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Plott

customer_reviews.title: I love love love my new ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my new ceramic knives. And yes, they do cut better than steel knives. The knife holder is small and I can just put a knife in without having to look for the section it goes in at.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Lauderdale

customer_reviews.title: really sharp knifes
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery and very sharp packaged nice great holder for them I put more knives in it and it looks like it was made for all the knifes
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how smooth and easily they cut through vegetables and meat. Love these knives. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: E Ashley Duke

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Knives has a slot in a nice butcher block as well as their own individual sleeves. My son thinks its redundant but i think the extra security is a nice touch. Knives feel good in the hand and super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Staggert

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp Knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very sharp and I love the holder they come with. I wonder how they keep their edge. I will have to look up how and if they can be sharpened
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pricing for a complete set of ceramic knives; which are usually far more expensive purchased separately. Also excellent quality and safe storage options included. You can’t beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Good product that looks nice and sleek in the kitchen. The ceramic will chip if you’re cutting on hard surfaces so I recommend wood cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love these knives and the holder
customer_reviews.text: We love these knives and the holder. Our household has completely transitioned to ceramic knives because of Voov! The customer service at this company is AMAZING. They are hyper responsive and honor their brand promises. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Agneessens

customer_reviews.title: These knives are all you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Great set of knives at a great value. We even freed up a kitchen drawer. Small footprint on the counter with easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality, it is so easy to cut everything with ceramic knifes! plus I got nice knifes holder. Thank you for making my cooking more pleasant :)
customer_reviews.author: Olesia

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until knife snapped in two pieces after 6 months. Company won’t stand by it because I only had a 1 month warranty. Never in my 50 years have I had a knife snap in 2 pieces!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie m.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the knives, easy to use and very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations in quality.
customer_reviews.text: The knives are made very well. The performance is something you would expect from a more expensive set. The case is easy to clean and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my husband for Father's Day and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father's Day and he loves it. He wasnt suppose to see it yet but it came to our house not in a shipping box, it was just there lol
customer_reviews.author: Beth Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: Ceramics are nice
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the knives. I hope they last
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price!
customer_reviews.text: This product was so awesome! Sharp and durable-love the stand it comes with! Ideal for people who hate the sound of sharpening knifes!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and had it shipped to my sister for a present. She said she likes it. It was shipped fast and it all arrived. Thank you VOOV ...
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pestana

customer_reviews.title: Shark, inexpensive knife set.
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp knife set for a reasonable price! Easy to use, nice feel to them. I love my voov knives.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp all-round knives!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have already used the knives to peel tomatoes, potatoes, and to cut off salmon skin. So far they have been super sharp and nice! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna Michalska

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value and the sharpness of the blades (at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value and the sharpness of the blades (at least for now) is unmatched even by far more expensive cutlery we own.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: They are just perfect, I got ride of my old knives and use only VOOV ceramic knives. I love the design and the knife block is practical and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Dania Naal

customer_reviews.title: We love the Knives
customer_reviews.text: They work really well and look very nice! The only thing I would change would be to make the holder a little smaller. It's a little too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Ease of maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ease of cleaning and maintaining these pretty knives and their innovative holder.
customer_reviews.author: Tadepalli

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson for Christmas and he LOVES them; happy grandma :O)
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knifes are sharp and the holder is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Frank Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two!
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked the first set we ordered as a gift so much, he bought himself one right afterward!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, nice looking set and shipping was fast. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BagleP

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder and razor sharp knives!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very recent purchase but very happy for the product I got for the price given. And the uniquely designed holder is fantastic and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Indrajit Das

customer_reviews.title: A home need for every kitchen. Expert choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and sharp. A need for every home kitchen. Best item to gift. Purchase n times and gift it to all my family members

customer_reviews.title: they are very sharp and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my dad for his birthday. He was so excited and could hardly wait to use them. He loves them, they are very sharp and comfortable to use.

customer_reviews.title: Take proper care of these knives and they will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of the storage unit. The knives are well balanced for everyday use.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed getting and beginning to use my new knife set. Very durable and easy to use. Makes cooking more fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love these knifes, they have very good quality. My aunt bought them before and she's happy too

customer_reviews.text: GOOD QUALITY KNIVES WITH SMART PROTECTIVE COVERS. THE BEST THING IS THE KNIFE BLOCK-VERY INTUITIVE.

customer_reviews.text: This set is nice unfortunately one of the knives snapped out of the handle while using

customer_reviews.text: Ingenious knife holder, and also very sharp. Works great on everything! Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: I love my knives. Honestly the best value for my money and so reasonably priced!

customer_reviews.text: Worth the money great price great value for the money

customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this set. It's made cooking easier, and I love the design. They are sharp and cut with ease.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set, came quickly, in perfect condition! Knives are sharp and sturdy. Extremely happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Box was a little damaged. Items were exactly as described.

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend the product
customer_reviews.text: Light, sharp and well designed. I can recommend the product.

customer_reviews.title: Stays sharp
customer_reviews.text: I liked very much put other knifes in a box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: They look sharp in my kitchen (pun intended). So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Knife sharpness
customer_reviews.text: I used the big knife to slice a onion and it didn’t work very well. I’m disappointed. I haven’t tried the other knives yet so maybe I’ll change my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Norma smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for ceramics
customer_reviews.text: These are so great. I got them as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves them. They do chip easily as expected but that can be easily fixed with a diamond-dust sharpener (go ahead and get that)
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of always having to sharpen metal knives,so I tried ceramic.These knives are razor sharp..easy to clean,and they stay sharp along time.I also enjoy the knife holder they came with.It’s soft,and doesn’t break the tips,like other cheap brands do.I definitely recommend these great knives 👍🏻😁
customer_reviews.author: M. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. The knives are sharp, lightweight and fit the hand well. The storage canister is a novel design that takes up little counter space and holds the knives (plus their individuals sheaths) firmly. This set would also make a relatively inexpensive housewarming gift. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Appierto

product_meta.title: VOOV Professional 5 Piece Pure Ceramic Knife Set with Knife Block, Cutting Board and Matching Sheaths
feature_bullets: ✔ A PERFECT STARTER OR SUPPLEMENTAL SET AND GIFT - Includes one 7” chef’s knife, 6” serrated knife, 5” santoku knife, 4” paring knife, modern knife block to safely store knives and high quality cutting board. This knife set comes in a gift box, making it an ideal present!

✔ HIGH PERFORMANCE AND DURABILITY - Features 100% pure, ultra-sharp performance ceramic blades (not just ceramic coated) that require little to no sharpening, and are rust free, scratch-proof and 10x stronger than stainless steel
✔ HYGIENIC AND LOW MAINTENANCE - Composed of non-reactive and dense zirconium dioxide (ceramic), making the blades germ resistant, non-odorous and very easy to clean
✔ THOUGHTFUL DESIGN FOR INCREASED COMFORT - Ergonomic and lightweight handle reduces wrist fatigue from cutting, slicing and chopping
✔ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Each purchase is backed by VOOV’s 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and limited warranty. If you are not happy, contact our customer support team!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars260 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
